name: No Dude is a Planet
description:
Inspired by Mario Galaxy, Outer Wilds and The Little Prince, ‘No Dude is a Planet’ is a 3D RPG comedy adventure game that has you play as an alien that has crash landed on a tiny planet.

Choose whether to help the inhabitants with various tasks around the little world in return for their help repairing your ship (or intentionally mess with them, and deal with the consequences).

This game was made in 1 month between September - October, 2021 as part of my MA in Games Design.

KEYBOARD & MOUSE CONTROLS:

  • W / A / S / D : move up / left / down / right
  • J / L : rotate left / right
  • I : interact (when prompted)
  • K : pick up / put down (when prompted)
  • Esc : pause
  • Left Shift: jog / run
  • Z : zoom out
  • E : eat a chicken (when prompted)
  • H : use leaf blower (when prompted)
  • P : pee in river (when prompted)

Warning: contains strong language!
